groups.name: spring.python.file
groups.description: Configuration properties for managing Python files.

groups.name: spring.python.pip
groups.description: Configuration group for Python package management using pip.

properties.name: spring.python.file.path
properties.description: Base directory path where Python scripts are stored or loaded from.

properties.name: spring.python.file.charset
properties.description: Charset used to read Python script files.

properties.name: spring.python.pip.command
properties.description: Command used to invoke pip for managing Python packages. Typically 'python -m pip', but can point to an interpreter inside a virtual environment or a Windows launcher.

properties.name: spring.python.pip.library.enabled
properties.description: Enables or disables automatic Python library management on Spring application lifecycle. When true, the system can preinstall or uninstall required packages.

properties.name: spring.python.pip.library.installed
properties.description: List of Python libraries to install before executing any Python scripts. Each entry defines a PythonLibraryManagement object.

properties.name: spring.python.pip.library.uninstalled
properties.description: List of Python libraries to uninstall before whole application shutdown. Each entry defines a PythonLibraryManagement object.

values.description: Use the system-wide Python interpreter to run pip.
Use the Windows 'py' launcher to run pip.
Use pip from a virtual environment on Linux or macOS.
Use pip from a virtual environment on Windows.
